  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_354250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_354250</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Augmentation de dioxyde de carbone</string>
            <string language="en">Increasing Carbon Dioxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zunehmendes Kohlendioxyd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido De Carbono Crescente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica Aumentante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυξανόμενο διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido De Carbono De Aumento</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Photosynthèse : augmentation de dioxyde de carbone. Animation interactive montrant comment le taux d'oxygène produit par la photosynthèse change à mesure que le niveau de dioxyde de carbone augmente.</string>
            <string language="en">Photosynthesis: Increasing carbon dioxide. Interactive animation showing how the rate of oxygen produced by photosynthesis changes as carbon dioxide level increases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">photosynthèse</string>
            <string language="en">photosynthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oxygène</string>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dioxyde de carbone</string>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese: Zunehmendes Kohlendioxyd. 
Interaktive Animationvertretung, wie die Kinetik des 
Sauerstoffes durch Fotosynthese produzierte, ändert, während 
Kohlendioxydstufe sich erhöht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotossíntese: Dióxido de carbono 
crescente. A exibição interativa do animation como a taxa do 
oxigênio produziu pela fotossíntese muda enquanto o nível do 
dióxido de carbono aumenta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotosintesi: Anidride carbonica aumentante.
La rappresentazione interattiva di animazione come il tasso di 
ossigeno ha prodotto dalla fotosintesi cambia mentre il livello 
dell'anidride carbonica aumenta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτοσύνθεση: Αυξανόμενο διοξείδιο του άνθρακα. 
Η διαλογική ζωτικότητα που επιδεικνύει πώς το ποσοστό 
οξυγόνου που παράγεται από τη φωτοσύνθεση αλλάζει ως επίπεδο 
διοξειδίου του άνθρακα αυξάνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotosíntesis: Bióxido de carbono de 
aumento. La demostración interactiva de la animación cómo el 
índice del oxígeno produjo por fotosíntesis cambia mientras que el 
nivel del bióxido de carbono aumenta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotosynthese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fotossíntese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oxigênio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fotosintesi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossigeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωτοσύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξυγόνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oxígeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plantas</string>
          </keyword>
